creator: M_Sorce@msn.com
text:
Build is blowing up on this command.

<property environment="myenv"/>

Why?

My, we havent seen this report for ages, mainly because everyone upgraded to
ant1.5 a long time ago.


The combination of Java1.4, Ant1.4.x and WinXP are incompatible; please upgrade
to either ant1.5 or ant1.6beta2.
creator: stevel@apache.org
